channel.title: Clark County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.description: End NV-168 West at US-93. Use US-93 north to Alamo; US-93 south to Las Vegas.

item.description: End NV-168 West at US-93 in Clark County. Use US-93 north for Pioche and Ely.

item.description: I-15 North - Exit 112 offramp at NV-170. Use NV-170 east for Riverside. Turn left to return to I-15 towards Mesquite (North) or Las Vegas (South).

item.title: End NV-169 North at I-15
item.description: End NV-169 North at I-15 (Exit 93). Use I-15 North for Salt Lake City (Utah); I-15 South for Las Vegas.

item.description: Distance marker at beginning of NV-169 northbound. Distance to Overton, Logandale, and I-15.

item.title: Las Vegas Blvd. South at Tropicana Ave.
item.description: Las Vegas Blvd. South at Tropicana Ave (NV-593). Use left lane for Tropicana Ave. east. Use middle lane for McCarran International Airport. Use right lanes to continue south on Las Vegas Blvd.

item.description: I-215 West approaching I-15. Use Exit 12A for I-15 North/Las Vegas. Approaching I-15 South/Los Angeles (California).

item.title: End NV-172 West at I-11/US-93/Bus. US-93
item.description: End NV-172 West at I-11/US-93/Bus. US-93 junction. Turn left for I-11/US-93 (Exit 2); continue straight for Bus. US-93

item.title: End NV-172 West at I-11/US-93/Bus. US-93
item.description: End NV-172 West at I-11/US-93/Bus. US-93. Continue straight for Bus. US-93 to Lake Mead and Boulder City. Turn left for I-11/US-93 for Las Vegas and Kingman (Arizona).

item.title: Begin NV-172 West
item.description: Begin NV-172 west at the Hoover Dam Security Checkpoint. Postmile 1.35.

item.description: Welcome to Nevada on NV-172 west (Hoover Dam access road).

item.title: End NV-564 West at I-11/I-215
item.description: End NV-564 West at I-11/I-215 junction. Merge right for I-11/US-93/US-95 south. Continue west for I-215 west.

item.title: NV-564 West at I-11/I-215/I-515
item.description: Entrance ramp to I-515/US-93/US-95 North to Las Vegas and I-11/US-93/US-95 South to Boulder City. End of NV-564 (Lake Mead Pkwy) west and begin of I-215 westbound.

item.description: NV-564 West (Lake Mead Parkway) approaching I-11/I-515/I-215/US-93/US-95 in Henderson.

item.description: NV-564 West Approaching I-515/US-93/US-95 North to Las Vegas

item.title: I-11 North - Exits 22 and Exit 62
item.description: I-11 north approaching Exit 22 - I-215 West/NV-564/Lake Mead Parkway. Approaching I-515 Exit 62 - Auto Show Drive. This is the north end of I-11. US-93 and US-95 join I-515 northbound. I-515 begins here northbound.

item.description: I-11 North approaching Exit 23 - I-215 West/NV-564 East/Lake Mead Parkway

item.description: I-11 north at Exit 15A - Railroad Pass Casino Road

item.title: US-95 North at I-11/US-93
item.description: US-95 North at I-11/US-93 (Exit 14) in Boulder City. Merge right for I-11/US-93/US-95 north onramp. US-95 joins US-93 north to I-15 in Las Vegas.

item.title: US-95 North at I-11/US-93/NV-173
item.description: US-95 North at I-11/US-93/US-95 North/Henderson/Las Vegas. Continue north for NV-173 to Bus. US-93/Boulder City.

item.description: US-95 North approaching I-11/US-93 in Boulder City.

item.description: US-95 North at NV-165 East.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching NV-165
item.description: US-95 North approaching NV-165 east to Nelson. Continue north on US-95 for Boulder City and Las Vegas.

item.title: End NV-164 East at US-95
item.description: End NV-164 East at US-95 in Searchlight. Turn right for US-95 south to Needles (CA); left for US-95 north to Las Vegas. Continue straight for Cottonwood Cove Road to Cottonwood Cove.

item.title: NV-164 West - Clark County
item.description: NV-164 west in Clark County. NV-164 between Searchlight and the California state line passes through a large Joshua Tree forest.

item.title: NV-164 West - Walking Box Ranch Road
item.description: NV-164 West at Walking Box Ranch Road

item.title: US-95 South at NV-164 West
item.description: US-95 South at NV-164 West to Nipton (California). Continue south on US-95 for Needles (California).

item.title: US-95 South Approaching NV-164
item.description: US-95 South approaching NV-164 in Searchlight.

item.title: End NV-173 South at I-11/US-93/US-95 North
item.description: End NV-173 South at I-11/US-93/US-95 North (Exit 14) onramp. Roadway turns into US-95 southbound.

item.title: End NV-173 South at I-11/US-93/US-95
item.description: End NV-173 South at I-11/US-93/US-95 in Boulder City. Use I-11/US-93/US-95 north for Las Vegas; use I-11/US-93 South for Kingman (Arizona); use US-95 south for Searchlight.

item.title: Begin NV-173 South - Boulder City
item.description: Begin NV-173 south in Boulder City. NV-173 is a short highway that follows the former route of US-95 between Bus. US-93 and I-11 in Boulder City.

item.title: NV-173 South - Mile 1
item.description: Mile 1 in Clark County on NV-173 south

item.title: Bus. US-93 North at NV-173 to US-95 South
item.description: Bus. US-93 North at NV-173 to US-95 South in Boulder City. Turn left for access to US-95. This is the former intersection of US-93 and US-95, before being re-routed with the construction of I-11.

item.title: Bus. US-93 North at NV-173
item.description: Bus. US-93 North at NV-173 in Boulder City. Use exit for TO US-95 South/Searchlight. This was the former intersection of US-93 and US-95, which was moved south a short distance with the construction of I-11. A short connector highway, NV-173, connects this intersection with US-95 at I-11.

item.title: Bus. US-93 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on Bus. US-93 north in Boulder City. Distance to US-95 South and Railroad Pass Casino Road

item.title: I-11 North - Exit 2 Offramp
item.description: I-11 north at Exit 2 offramp. Merge left for NV-172 to Hoover Dam. Merge right for Bus. US-93 North to Boulder City and Lake Mead.

item.description: I-11 north approaching Exit 2 - Bus. US-93/Boulder City

item.title: I-11 North - Distance Marker / Pacific Time
item.description: First distance marker on I-11 north in Nevada. Distance to Henderson and Las Vegas. Entering Pacific Time Zone.

item.description: I-11 south at Exit 2 - US-93 Business/Boulder City. Access to Hoover Dam. This is the last exit on I-11 southbound in Nevada.

item.description: I-15 south at Exit 14 - US-95 South/Boulder City/Searchlight. US-95 south leaves I-11/US-93 here. Northbound US-95 joins US-93 north to I-15.

item.description: I-11 south approaching Exit 14. Use Exit 14 for Boulder City. Next exit is 12 miles.
